original.analysis_summary: Resume shows solid SQL and Excel skills with measurable impact but lacks Python, Power BI, and advanced analytics tools, limiting competitiveness. ATS format is good but minor encoding issues exist.

improved.resume_text:
SWARNATRISHA GHOSH
ghoshswarna712@gmail.com | 9476602015 | Gurgaon, Haryana | https://www.linkedin.com/in/swarnatrisha-ghosh-8a1791197?utm_source=share&utm_campaign=share_via&utm_content=profile&utm_medium=android_app

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Data Analytics Professional with expertise in Advanced SQL, Advanced Excel, Power BI, and Python, experienced in dashboard development, data visualization, and process optimization across EdTech and healthcare domains. Seeking to leverage analytical and technical skills to drive data-driven decision-making in a dynamic analytics role.

TECHNICAL SKILLS
• Programming & Languages: Python (NumPy, Pandas), Advanced SQL (CTEs, Window Functions, Stored Procedures, Triggers)
• Data Visualization: Power BI, Advanced Excel (Power Query, AI Tools in Excel, Data Transformation)
• Soft Skills: Communication, Teamwork, Problem Solving, Time Management
• Other Tools: Metabase, Jupyter

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Coding Ninjas | Aug. 2024 – Present
Program Associate – Data Analytics | Gurgaon, Haryana
• Designed and deployed a daily admissions tracking dashboard that replaced manual bi-weekly logs, resulting in a 75% reduction in processing time and improved visibility into admissions, drops, and batch shifts.
• Optimized referral banners using NPS data, boosting referrals by 7% MoM with 80% attributed to promoters.
• Streamlined data flow, reducing dashboard turnaround from 7 to 3 days, cutting reporting time by 57%.
• Introduced an automated system enabling instructors to access schedules, feedback, and ratings independently, reducing manual follow-ups by the operations team and cutting communication time by 60%.
• Leveraged retention curve analysis and learner insights to uncover drop-off points, supporting strategies that boosted course completion rates.

Coding Ninjas | Feb. 2024 – Jul. 2024
Data Analytics Intern | Gurgaon, Haryana
• Developed 30+ interactive top-tier learning sessions on SQL and Excel, along with 6+ case studies for various specializations, employing diverse instructional techniques for tailored audience learning.
• Achieved exceptional ratings of 4.5+ and an increase of 30% audience engagement affirming the enduring quality.
• Effectively utilized Metabase to streamline query processes, analysis capabilities, and optimize decision-making.

MedTel Healthcare Pvt. Ltd. | Aug. 2022 – Dec. 2022
Growth Intern | Bangalore
• Led funnel analysis to identify drop-offs, driving changes that boosted lead-to-sale conversions by 15% and improved quarterly sales.
• Designed interactive visualizations in Excel to present data trends over a period, facilitating easier comprehension.
• Created an Excel database to manage and analyze investor data, ensuring precise data accessibility for decision makers.
• Implemented a social media strategy- WhatsApp Campaign, resulted in 10% increase in website visits within a month.
• Researched and generated compelling topics, crafted well-researched 5+ healthcare articles on latest topics for website.

EDUCATION
Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani
Bachelor of Pharmacy | Aug. 2019 – May 2023
Pilani, Rajasthan

PROJECTS

E-com Orders | Power BI
• Analyzed e-commerce order data to identify sales trends, customer behavior, and product performance.
• Utilized Power BI for data cleaning, DAX calculations, and interactive dashboard creation.
• Delivered actionable insights to optimize inventory management and marketing strategies.

Covid-19 | Python (NumPy, Pandas)
• Processed and visualized Covid-19 datasets to track infection rates, recoveries, and regional trends.
• Applied data wrangling, aggregation, and visualization techniques using Python, NumPy, and Pandas.
• Generated comprehensive reports to support public health decision-making.

Retail Store | Advanced SQL
• Conducted sales and inventory analysis for a retail store using advanced SQL queries (CTEs, Window Functions).
• Built data models to monitor stock levels, sales performance, and customer segmentation.
• Provided recommendations to improve stock replenishment and sales strategies.

CERTIFICATIONS
Data Analytics | Coding Ninjas | 2026
